title: Afterburner - vol.1
description: Afterburner - vol.1, by Sound4Apps Afterburner vol.1 is a pack with action oriented music, based on six genuine songs composed for action, 1:st person, platform, level based and adventure games.
longDescription:
*** Be shure to check out our Showreel at https://www.Sound4apps.com***


Songs featured in this package:

Motorbrain: Think gasoline, leather jackets and big guns. This track will put some muscles on your Avatar and bring a bit of rudeness to your game. Song as loop (variation without guitar solo). Lenght 3:23.

Dunbar is silenced: A heavy, up-tempo riff based rock track with an upshifting middle part and plenty of musical variation. Lenght 4:56.

Checkpoint Ariel: A cinematic ,dark melody submerged in an energizing, modern rock track. Numerous loops and bits taken from this song. Track length 4.27.

Daredevil: Heavy, rock´n´roll track with roaring guitars and classy vibes. Song as loop. Length 1:56.

Journey: Music for the ride! A cool, electronic beat with steady bass and minimalistic estetics. Song as loop (2 versions). Lenght 2:16.

Spaces: This track features heavy bass and a twitching electronic beat that leaves no one unaffected. Modern, electronic and full of attitude. Song as loop (2 differnt versions). Lenght 3:32.


IF YOU NEED ADAPTATION OF THIS MUSIC FOR YOUR GAME, WE ARE HERE FOR YOU!


More often than not, the music you intend for your game needs some adaptation in order to produce the perfect match between what you hear and see. If you need this music in any other format, length, stems or loops, we can do this for you.


Contact us via sound4apps.com and let us know what you need. We´ll be right back.


Feedback? Please contact us. https://www.Sound4apps.com


Thanks for downloading!
